sentences.en: Cut the fruit in half and inspect the pips: if they are turning slightly brown it is ready for harvesting.
sentences.cn: 把果实切成两半，检查一下其中的籽：如果有点成棕色，那就该收获了。

sentences.en: Elaine went outside to inspect the playing field.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩走到外面查看操场。

sentences.en: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.cn: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

sentences.en: He gave us permission to enter his premises to inspect the meters.
sentences.cn: 他允许我们进入他的房屋检查仪表.

sentences.en: He was instructed to inspect the cargo on the ship and detain such cargo if necessary.
sentences.cn: 他奉命去检查船上所载货物并于必要时扣留该项货物.

sentences.en: Health Department officials came to inspect the factory.
sentences.cn: 卫生部的官员来视察这个工厂.

sentences.en: However, when the judges came to inspect the new machine, they were amazed.
sentences.cn: 然而, 当评判员们来检验这一新机器时, 他们惊呆了.

sentences.en: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.cn: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.en: Several years later, they heard that Napoleon himself was coming to inspect them.
sentences.cn: 几年以后, 听说拿破仑本人要来视察他们.

sentences.en: The building is regularly inspected by the fire-safety officer.
sentences.cn: 消防安全官定期巡视这座大楼。

sentences.en: The buyer must inspect the goods supplied for defects.
sentences.cn: 买方必须检查--所供应的商品有无瑕疵.

sentences.en: The captain wants to inspect your kit.
The Director leaves tomorrow for a tour of overseas branches , ie to inspect them.
sentences.cn: 董事长明天动身去视察海外分支机构.

sentences.en: The mayor will inspect our school tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 市长明天要来视察我们学校.

sentences.en: The stewards will inspect the course to see if racing is possible.
sentences.cn: 那些干事将检视赛马场看是否适宜比赛.

sentences.en: They don't normally give any advance notice about which building they're going to inspect.
sentences.cn: 他们一般不会预先通知检查哪座大楼。

sentences.en: They have the right to come in and inspect the meter.
Two policemen held up a truck so as to inspect the driver's license.
sentences.cn: 两个警察让一辆卡车停住以便检查司机的驾驶证.

words.tran_cn: 检查员；视察团；检查员的辖区

trans.tran_en: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it
